debt-selection.submitted-note: Note: This debt has already been disputed on {{ date }} and cannot be disputed again. It can take up to 60 days to process.

dispute-submission-alert.title: Your dispute submission is in progress
dispute-submission-alert.description:
We sent a confirmation email to {{ email }}. We’ll send you a confirmation letter in the mail once we’ve processed your dispute. You should receive that letter within 60 days.

We expect to make a decision on your dispute within 180 days. We’ll notify you of the outcome with a letter in the mail.

first-action.header: We’ll confirm when we processed your dispute
first-action.description: After we receive your submission, we’ll review your dispute. You should receive a confirmation letter in the mail within 60 days.

second-action.description: We expect to make a decision on your dispute within 180 days. We’ll notify you of the outcome with a letter in the mail.

sip-options.unauth-start-text: Sign in or create an account

info.about-form: Use this form if you’d like to dispute all or part of the debt.
info.before-form: What to know before you fill out this form
info.form-usage: Right now, you can only use this form to dispute debts from benefit overpayments. You can’t use it to dispute copay bills atthis time.
info.dispute-charges-link: Learn how to dispute copay bills
info.payments-note: You may need to make payments on your debt while we review your dispute.

alert.title: We’re sorry. This application is unavailable.
alert.description: We are currently working on this application

contact.title: How to contact us if you have questions

call-us.suffix: . We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. ET.

contact.ask-va-text: Or you can ask us a question online through Ask VA. Select the category and topic for the VA benefit this form is related to.

ask-va-link.text: Contact us online through Ask VA

my-v411.prefix: If you have trouble using this online form, call our MyVA411 main information line at

accredited-rep.text: If you need help to gather your information or fill out your form, contact an accredited representative or VSO.

link.text: Get help filling out your form

overpayments.prefix: If you have questions about your benefit overpayments, call us at
overpayments.suffix: from overseas). We're here Monday through Friday, 7:30 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. ET.

copay.prefix: If you have questions about your copay bills, call us at
copay.suffix: . We're here Monday through Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. ET.

pdf.logo-alt: VA U.S Department of Veteran Affairs

submission.text:
We’ll send you a confirmation letter in the mail once we’ve processed your dispute. You should receive that letter within 60 days.

We expect to make a decision on your dispute within 180 days. We’ll notify you of the outcome with a letter in the mail.
